channel.title: Need help with making a safe zone
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is the right info, but this is what I think I remember seeing you need.
Southeast corner: X=2767 Y=2775 Northeast corner: X=2766 Y=2792 Northwest corner: X=2747 Y=2791 Southwest corner: X= 2748 Y=2775
If that's the wrong information, someone tell me what to find, I'm trying to make this spot a drop party location, I got the command made and everything just need to make it a safe zone now.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 10:03:31 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? :(

item.title: Need help with making a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:

Grrrrrrr.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 09:58:03 AM[/size][hr]Anyone else that’s on (that knows how to make safe) want to log onto my server and I’ll show you the spot I need to be a safe zone. And you get the right coords.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 10:15:29 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 10:22:38 AM[/size][hr]FFS Anyone???

item.source: Need help with making a safe zone

item.title: Need help with making a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

Edit: Try this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 ) || (absX >=2775 && absX <=2792 && absY >=2748 && absY <=2766) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a safe zone

item.title: Need help with making a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Ummm… I guess there is some wrong with this:

(absX >=2792  && absX <=2775  && absY >=2766  && absY <=2748)

I put it in and got 100 errors.

I put it right after the last thing here:

[code]public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||

[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Okay, so if I add this code after all the other after public boolean nonwild it will make the area a safe zone?

(absX >=2792  && absX <=2775  && absY >=2766  && absY <=2748)

Is that right, I compared it to the others by that, and it looks the exact same except the coords.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 11:08:23 PM[/size][hr]No it’s no, I looked like 80 gagillion times, and the only one I found was for testscape. Not Phonescape.

Read full topic
